text: Jan Firlej (born 26 September 1996) is a Polish volleyball player, a member of Polish club GKS Katowice. ==Career== ===Clubs=== Firlej debuted in PlusLiga in 2015 as AZS Politechnika Warszawska.Wielki talent z PlusLigi, zainspirowany przez Błaszczykowskiego – przegladsportowy.pl – 23-12-2015 Since then he was a setter next to another player on this position, World Champion Paweł Zagumny, who is one of his idols.Jan Firlej: Staram się podpatrywać Pawła Zagumnego – siatka.org – 12-02-2016 ==Sporting achievements== * National championships ** 2018/2019 16px Belgian Championship, with Lindemans Aalst ==References== ==External links== * PlusLiga player profile Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:People from Radom Category:Sportspeople from Masovian Voivodeship Category:Polish men's volleyball players Category:Czarni Radom players Category:AZS Warszawa players Category:GKS Katowice (volleyball) players Category:Expatriate volleyball players in Belgium
title: Jan Firlej (volleyball)
